prompts.prompt: A hyper-realistic full-body portrait of a stylish man standing casually in front of a modern architectural backdrop with sleek glass panels and soft natural daylight reflecting off the surfaces. He is wearing a crisp traditional white shalwar kameez layered under a tailored grey formal blazer, paired with polished black leather shoes. His hands rest in his pockets, one leg crossed over the other in a relaxed stance. He looks slightly to the side with confidence, exuding elegance and sophistication. Ultra-detailed, cinematic lighting, professional portrait style.

Aesthetic outdoor morning photography, a young man in a casual outfit: oversized white t-shirt with loose wide black jeans. He sits while drinking tea on the terrace of an outdoor café surrounded by lush green plants. In the foreground near the camera, a blurred coffee cup forms a natural frame. Soft golden sunlight filters through the leaves, creating a warm and peaceful atmosphere. The composition is candid, cinematic, and ultra-detailed, evoking the calm of a serene morning in the city.

Create a hyper-realistic cinematic fantasy night scene. This man in the above image sits on the rooftop of a skyscraper in Charminar Street, Hyderabad city. The surrounding skyscrapers look tiny compared to his massive size. His right hand is open, palm facing upward. On his large palm, a little fairy. The atmosphere is romantic, set at midnight. Above the city skyline, a bright full moon illuminates the clear night sky. Around them, twelve tiny rainbow-colored fairies shaped like glowing hearts fly playfully, spreading blessings of love and support. Each fairy shines with a different rainbow hue, forming a magical halo around the scene. Lighting is dreamy and cinematic, blending neon city glow with soft moonlight. Ultra-detailed, 8K resolution, dramatic composition, magical and surreal yet realistic.

Both wear an oversized deep navy velvet suit, a white silk shirt unbuttoned at the collar, and polished black shoes, creating a bold, moody, high-fashion editorial atmosphere with visible light rays, sharp shadows, and layered contrast in a 3:4 ratio.

Ultra-realistic editorial portrait of a graceful South Asian woman with a poised, regal expression. She wears a deep brown sequinned saree with intricate mirror and thread embroidery across the fabric, subtly transitioning into maroon near the hem. The saree has sheer sleeves and densely embellished borders, worn in a classic drape with soft pleats and full arm coverage. Her blouse has a modest V-neckline. She poses in a three-quarter angle, left arm folded across her waist, right hand lifted near her chin in a contemplative pose. Her makeup is flawless and radiant—defined brows, soft contour, matte nude lipstick, and a sculpted nose. She wears large, intricately detailed traditional jhumkas with clustered pearls. Hairstyle is upgraded: voluminous twisted low bun with tendrils softly framing her face, adding allure and elegance. Background: A traditional Lippan art wall with ornate white clay motifs, mirror inlays, and earthy textures—exuding Rajasthani folk elegance. Ambient lighting is soft and diffused, with subtle golden tones highlighting her cheekbones and saree textures. Studio-quality 32k detail, 3:4 aspect ratio, no watermarks, no overlays, crisp color grading, cinematic editorial finish. Expression: poised, confident, timeless.
